name: City Madness ; Weekly Game Jam #150
description:
City madness is a game made for the Weekly Game Jam #150.  
The theme was "You're the enemy" .

The game is a local multiplayer game and was made in about 12 hours, spread over 4 days.

The controls are:
Player1 (Defender):
WASD to move

Player2 (Attacker):
Left mouse button the spawn enemies

Can you survive all 20 waves?
